lead_paragraph: Security fears are on everybody's lips at the ITB travel trade fair in Berlin this year as a battered tourist industry seeks to reassure travelers and tour operators that they need not shy away from booking summer holidays for this year.

headline.main: Security Fears Overshadow World's Biggest Travel Fair
headline.print_headline: Security Fears Overshadow World's Biggest Travel Fair

snippet: Security fears are on everybody's lips at the ITB travel trade fair in Berlin this year as a battered tourist industry seeks to reassure travelers and tour operators that they need not shy away from booking summer holidays for this year.
